Books.Name: Dark Tower
Books.description: The Dark Tower is a series of eight books  written by American author Stephen King
Books.author: Stephen King

Books.Name: Blind Watchmaker
Books.description: the author presents an explanation of, and argument for, the theory of evolution by means of natural selection.
Books.author: Richard Dawkins

Books.Name: Harry Potter
Books.description: The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Books.author: J.K. Rowling

Books.Name: A Pocket Guide to The Empire and its Environs
Books.description: was part of the Collector's Edition package for TES IV: Oblivion. The new version was much more even-handed and less propagandist.
Books.author: Uncknown

Books.Name: Witcher
Books.description: is a fantasy series of short stories and novels about the witcher Geralt of Rivia.
Books.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
